INSTALL_MSG: MAKE SURE YOU HAVE READ THE README.TXT IN THE REPO, AND HAVE FOLLOWED THE INSTRUCTIONS, OTHERWISE THIS WILL ***NOT*** WORK.
NAME: CheckPTC
SHORT: Checks if we can login and get an access token for PoGo from PTC.
DESCRIPTION: Logs into Pokemon Trainer Club and requests a PoGo access token.
